footer.description: FlowKan helps you organize your work and your team visually and efficiently. Simplify project management and achieve your goals.
footer.title: Contact

link.text: Generate an invitation link you can share with anyone.

AI.prompt:
Acts as a project management assistant and expert in task organization. Your goal is to generate a complete and detailed description for a new task card, based solely on its title.
          The response should be concise, using a format and/or detailed steps, emulating the format of a pencil sketch for quick planning. The description should be detailed enough to guide the execution of the task.

          Generation criteria:
          Analyze the {{title}}: Identify the objective, subject, and main action.
          Generate the Structure for {{title}}: Create a list of steps or sections that anyone would need to follow to complete that task.

boardsitem.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this board?

emptylist.p1: You don’t have any boards yet.
emptylist.p2: Do you want to create one?

home.banner: Simplify your tasks, maximize your productivity

features.title: Key Features
features.viewTask: View and manage your tasks with ease
features.jobsTeam: Work effortlessly with your team in real time
features.upToDay: Stay up to date with your project’s progress
features.events: Organize your deadlines and important events

first.text: This app has transformed the way we manage our projects. Absolutely indispensable!
first.user: Ana García, CEO at Company X

second.text: The interface is incredibly intuitive and the collaboration features are on another level.

third.text: I never thought task management could be so simple and visually appealing.

docs.title: How you can use our platform

management.title: Project Management
management.message: From small teams to large companies, our tool adapts to your complex project management needs.

planning.title: Event Planning
planning.message: Organize every detail of your events, from logistics to invitations, in a visual way.

monitoring.title: Personal Tracking
monitoring.message: Manage your personal tasks, goals, and daily habits with an easy-to-use Kanban system.
